subject: Medicine
title: Exercise and the Heart
description: A short lesson to help you apply Exercise and the Heart.

hook.text: Your heart is a muscle, and muscles grow with exercise.

buildup.text: Aerobic activity strengthens the heart wall over time.

discovery.text: A stronger heart pumps more blood with fewer beats.

twist.text: Just 30 minutes of walking a day cuts heart risk sharply.

climax.text: Inactivity is now considered as risky as smoking.

quiz.question: How much daily walking can significantly reduce heart risk?
